seo.description: Centrifuge's fund management platform brings the full power of onchain finance to asset managers and investment funds.

hero_fund.title:
Asset Management, 
Onchain
hero_fund.body: Centrifuge's fund management platform brings the full power of onchain finance to asset managers and investment funds. Capture your entire fund's onchain and offchain portfolio positions, transactions, and operations data in a secure, immutable, and reportable manner.

prime_partners.title: Built from years of experience bringing RWAs to DeFi

fund_features.title: Your new central control panel
fund_features.body: Tokenize your funds and streamline access to all necessary service providers and investors, saving operational overhead and increasing liquidity. Key benefits of Centrifuge's Onchain Fund Management Platform include:

items.title: Reporting & Transparency
items.body: All portfolio positions, transactions, fees, and operational data – from offchain and onchain sources – are captured and reported for trustless verification.

items.title: Operational Efficiency
items.body: Fund operations are automated to improve reporting cadence and more easily integrate with third-party services to reduce operational overhead and cost.

items.title: Securitization
items.body: Enables pooling of tokenized assets into tradable instruments with tranching, waterfall distributions, loan tape management and investor management for enhanced liquidity and risk distribution.

items.title: Programmability
items.body: Funds can be more easily integrated with other programmable interfaces to dynamically interface with DeFi protocols with programmable constraints.

rwa_yields.title: Streamline fund operations
rwa_yields.body: Easily construct portfolios that offer exactly the right risk profile and incorporate the unique complexities of markets. From single tranche liquid portfolios to multi-tranche asset-backed offerings, automatically manage loan tape, calculate distribution waterfalls, net-asset-valuations, and asset-performance. All onchain.

rwa_usp.title: Why build onchain?
rwa_usp.body: Save costs and create efficiencies with real-time, accurate access to holdings, fully integrated with the necessary service providers for operating an institutional-grade offering.
items: Save up to 150 bps running the fund

prime_integration.title: The home for all things real-world assets
prime_integration.body: Centrifuge Prime combines the infrastructure for the tokenization and management of real-world assets, with an ecosystem of critical partners and services, to provide the assets and opportunities that DAOs and DeFi protocols want to see.

items.title: Infrastructure
items.body: RWA tokenization, securitization, and a compliant out of the box legal framework

items.title: Ecosystem
items.body: Decentralized and objective credit risk reporting and analysis functions for assets and portfolio

items.title: Assets
items.body: Diversified asset classes including US Treasury Bills, Asset Backed Securities, Real Estate, and more
